Hello and welcome to the University of Delaware!
I am Delaware's beloved mascot, youDee, and you have been chosen to be my replacement.
However before you can start classes here or even begin your training to replace me you must travel to the different locations on campus
and learn what it means to truly be a Blue Hen. With every area you clear you will earn a new piece of mascot equipment and will become that much closer to becoming my replacement.
And with that being said good luck future mascot!
